description: This file defines a SettingsRepository class that manages user interface preferences such as theme mode, layout, and sorting order. It persists these preferences using the SharedPreferences package, enabling saving and retrieval of user settings across application sessions.

classes.name: SettingsRepository
classes.description: A class that handles persisting and retrieving user interface preferences such as theme mode, layout, and sorting order using SharedPreferences.

methods.name: getThemeMode
methods.description: Retrieves the stored theme mode preference, returning a ThemeMode object (light, dark, or system default).

methods.name: setThemeMode
methods.description: Stores the selected ThemeMode preference into SharedPreferences.

methods.name: getLayout
methods.description: Retrieves the stored layout preference, defaults to 'grid' if not set.

methods.name: setLayout
methods.description: Stores the chosen layout preference into SharedPreferences.

methods.name: getSort
methods.description: Retrieves the sorting preference, defaults to 'updated_at' if not set.

methods.name: setSort
methods.description: Stores the sorting preference into SharedPreferences.
